summary: This is an email chain regarding the drafting and editing of a press release. The emails are exchanged between individuals, with one sender apologizing for not consulting others earlier and discussing incorporating edits from 'the chiefs'. The document appears to be internal coordination on a public statement.
keyFacts: The document is an email chain dated June 27-28, 2020, discussing a draft press release.
The sender mentions the press release will go through many rounds of edits and that edits from 'the chiefs' will be incorporated.
The email addresses are redacted, with only placeholders like '(USANYS)' visible, indicating the senders/recipients are not publicly named in this version.
